subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|爻|子|攴|alt3=攵|t1=divination|t2=child|t3=teaching cane|c1=p|c2=s|c3=s|ls=psc}} – teaching a child counting or divination.
